description:
Redesign forms to clearly distinguish required fields with progressive disclosure of optional fields. Group related fields and show completion percentage to reduce cognitive load on long forms.

**Rationale:** Users waste time filling optional fields thinking they're required, or submit incomplete forms missing required data. Unclear field importance creates frustration and increases validation error rates.
title: Required vs Optional Field Visual Hierarchy
